sentences.en: A hermetic seal is used at the top of this glass bottle.
sentences.cn: 这个玻璃瓶的口用密封条封着.

sentences.en: A hermetic seal is used at the top of this sample box.
sentences.cn: 这个样品盒的口用密封条封着.

sentences.en: A hermetic seal is used on this glass bottle.
sentences.cn: 这个玻璃瓶用的是一种密封盖.

sentences.en: Hermetic: Airtight sealing of an object.
sentences.cn: 全密封: 一种对物体不透气的密封.

sentences.en: In 1886 Yeats formed the Dublin Lodge of the hermetic Society.
sentences.cn: 1886年叶芝组建了神秘社团都柏林分会.

sentences.en: Is the analytical theory presented here hermetic and complete?
sentences.cn: 我发表的分析理论研究是否严谨而完整 呢 ?

sentences.en: Its film industry operates in its own curiously hermetic way.
sentences.cn: 其电影产业以它奇特的与世隔绝的方式运作。

sentences.en: Other poets classed as hermetic include Mario Luzi and Alfonso Gatto.
sentences.cn: 归入赫尔墨斯式的诗人还有M· 卢齐和A· 加托.

sentences.en: The digesting characteristics of the open atmospheric vessel and the hermetic high pressure vessel were compared.
sentences.cn: 比较了开口容器和密闭容器消解的特点.

sentences.en: The premium design of anti - sheets make more effectively hermetic.
sentences.cn: 设计精巧的 防 逆流阀封闭效果更佳.

sentences.en: the strange, hermetic world of the theatre
sentences.cn: 神秘、与世隔绝的戏剧世界

sentences.en: Their work is more cosily hermetic than ever.
sentences.cn: 他们的工作比任何时候都要更加安逸，更加不受外界干扰。

sentences.en: This is a broad statement of the Hermetic axiom - As above, so below.
sentences.cn: 这是赫密斯公理的概括陈述 —— “以下,如上”.

sentences.en: This would permit air to enter, breaking the hermetic seal of the jar.
sentences.cn: 这会造成漏气，破坏罐子的密封性。

words.tran_cn: 密封地，不透气地；炼金术地
[机]密封的；与外界隔绝的；不透气的；炼金术的

trans.tran_cn: 密封的，不透气的，不受外界影响的，炼金术的，深奥的
trans.tran_en: If a container has a hermetic seal, the seal is very tight so that no air can get in or out
